Hardin:
And, You brought me Stable Ectoplasm! Excellent!
I see that You have many questions. Allow me to satisfy Your curiosity, at least partially.
Having conducted various studies and experiments, I came to certain conclusions.
The energy that is the soul, like the water in the balloon. Depending on the bowl shape water can take different forms, but once the shell hardens, the form can no longer be modified.
Another example: while the plaster is wet, you can mould any shape, but when it hardens, it will have to break to change the shape.
The souls of gods eternal and immortal and therefore free from physical limitations. The gods may come and go, appearing in various forms at will.
That is why the magic transformation was originally the exclusive preserve of the gods.
